data.message: The best free app i am using today... connecting family and friends.... the best connection! Thank you Facebook.

replies.message: We appreciate the compliments, Loren, and we're glad to hear you're able to stay connected with friends and family! -Jessica

Facebook STOP changing my settings! Everytime I set my feed to most recent so i can read the most recent posts from family you autoswitch the thing back to top stories when I come back. I've already read what they did last weekend. My feed my choice, Facebook STOP it.

Facebook Hi Facebook, can you help us page owners in Cambodia? We face major issue of some posts went missing everyday. As artcile publishers we have contributed our efforts into writing articles and can't afford to see our articles went missing everyday, it breaks down our hearts. I tried to report bug, but there is no response so far. Please get it fixed, thanks.
Mark Zuckerberg you are simply genius. Billion of people around the world admire you. You are the     youths sensesion. I want be like you
